K12D0701_H0664:3a-1: padma mu ku ta tantra n'a ma /
K12D0701_H0664:3a-3: padma cod pan zhes bya ba'i rgyud /
K12D0701_H0664:3a-4: bcom ldan 'das 'jam pa'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12D0701_H0664:3a-5: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
K12D0701_H0664:3a-6: bcom ldan 'das lha'i gzhal med khang na longs spyod
K12D0701_H0664:3a-7: rdzogs pa'i skur sangs rgyas nas byang chub sems dpa'i
K12D0701_H0664:3a-8: 'khor dpag tu med pa dang thabs cig tu bzhugs
K12D0701_H0664:3a-9: te / de nas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen
K12D0701_H0664:3a-10: po'i sgo kun nas 'phro ba zhes bya ba'i ting
K12D0701_H0664:3a-11: nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te /
K12D0701_H0664:3a-12: 'od zer gyis rnam par snang mdzad gang chen mtsho'i
K12D0701_H0664:3a-13: zhing gi rdul la reg pas reg ma thag tu
K12D0701_H0664:3b-0: @3b bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas stong rtsa gnyis
K12D0701_H0664:3b-1: la mchod nas 'od zer de bcom ldan 'das kyi
K12D0701_H0664:3b-2: dbu'i gtsug tor du nub bo //
K12D0701_H0664:3b-3: nub ma thag tu thugs rje chen po phyag stong spyan stong dang ldan pa /
K12D0701_H0664:3b-4: sku mdog gangs kyi rtse la nyi ma shar ba ltar dkar ba /
K12D0701_H0664:3b-5: zhal bcu gcig gi rtsa ba'i zhal dkar po /
K12D0701_H0664:3b-7: g-yas ljang gu; g-yon dmar ba /
K12D0701_H0664:3b-10: byi ru bcag pa lta bur gyur te 'dzum pa
K12D0701_H0664:3b-11: mdzad nas thugs rje chen po'i bdag po 'phags pa
K12D0701_H0664:3b-12: spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la gzigs so //
K12D0701_H0664:3b-13: de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras
K12D0701_H0664:3b-14: gzigs dbang phyug gis thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan
K12D0701_H0664:3b-16: sku dang sngags dang las rnams dang //
K12D0701_H0664:3b-17: khyad par cho ga bstan par gyis //
K12D0701_H0664:3b-18: zhes gsol ba btab nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang
K12D0701_H0664:3b-19: chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
K12D0701_H0664:3b-20: la legs so // zhes bya ba byin nas bka' stsal pa /
K12D0701_H0664:3b-21: sku ni rnam pa 'di lta ste //
K12D0701_H0664:3b-22: thugs rje dag pas chu shel te //
K12D0701_H0664:3b-23: mnyam par bzhengs pas 'gro don mdzad //
K12D0701_H0664:3b-24: chu shel mdog 'dra zhal gsum dkar //
K12D0701_H0664:3b-25: ljang gu'i mdog can nag po che //
K12D0701_H0664:4a-2: drang srong dag tu ri dvags brgyan //
K12D0701_H0664:4a-3: zhi ba 'dzum dang bzhad pa dang //
K12D0701_H0664:4a-4: khros pa'i zhal mnga' spyan gsum mdzes //
K12D0701_H0664:4a-5: bcu pa sems dpa'i rtags can te //
K12D0701_H0664:4a-6: bcu gcig bcom ldan 'das kyi bdag /
K12D0701_H0664:4a-7: yon tan nor bu mu tig phreng //
K12D0701_H0664:4a-8: 'phrin las sna tshogs smad dkris pa //
K12D0701_H0664:4a-9: dang po'i phyag ni thal sbyar te //
K12D0701_H0664:4a-10: g-yas pa rin chen phreng ba 'dzin //
K12D0701_H0664:4a-12: g-yas pa mchog sbyin mdzad pa'o //
K12D0701_H0664:4a-13: g-yon pa ril ba spyi blugs te //
K12D0701_H0664:4a-15: g-yon pa na ni mda' gzhu ste //
K12D0701_H0664:4a-16: lhag ma mchog sbyin spyan ldan no //
K12D0701_H0664:4a-17: de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad
K12D0701_H0664:4a-18: de cod pan gnyis nas rin po che rab tu
K12D0701_H0664:4a-19: 'phro ba dang / bcom ldan 'das la sangs rgyas
K12D0701_H0664:4a-20: thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs las byung ba'i padma'i
K12D0701_H0664:4a-21: steng du rigs lnga byung ba ni /
K12D0701_H0664:4a-28: khang bu brtsegs pa'i rin po che de'i nang du seng+ge dang /
K12D0701_H0664:4a-36: yum ni sku mdog sngon mo ste /
K12D0701_H0664:4b-1: tshad med bzhi ste phyag bzhis mdzes //
K12D0701_H0664:4b-2: sems dpa'i rgyan dang ldan pa yi //
K12D0701_H0664:4b-3: mnyam pa yi ni skyil krung bcas //
K12D0701_H0664:4b-4: yab ni sku mdog ser po ste //
K12D0701_H0664:4b-6: thal sbyar nor bu'i bgrang phreng 'dzin //
K12D0701_H0664:4b-8: yang na 'od zer rab bkye ste //
K12D0701_H0664:4b-9: zla ba nyi ma las byung ba'i //
K12D0701_H0664:4b-10: nyi ma'i mdog can nyi ma ni; ;gzhon nu autpal mchog sbyin mdzad //
K12D0701_H0664:4b-11: zla ba las skyes nam mkha'i mdog /
K12D0701_H0664:4b-12: cung zhig khros pa rdo rje can //
K12D0701_H0664:4b-13: dkar po gangs ltar dkar ba ste //
K12D0701_H0664:4b-15: drag po gnyis dang hr'i yig las //
K12D0701_H0664:4b-16: gnyis med tshul gyis 'bras bur rdzogs //
K12D0701_H0664:4b-17: ha ya gri bas khams gsum sdud //
K12D0701_H0664:4b-18: khro gnyer can gyis 'phrin las mdzad //
K12D0701_H0664:4b-19: gshin rje gshed po gter 'dzin cing //
K12D0701_H0664:4b-20: khams gsum rnam rgyal bdud sde 'joms //
K12D0701_H0664:4b-21: 'khor lo dkar po dge ba'i steng //
K12D0701_H0664:4b-22: gru bzhi sgo bzhi rta babs bcas //
K12D0701_H0664:4b-23: dang por dkon mchog rab dad cing //
K12D0701_H0664:4b-24: tshad mad bzhi ni yongs su rdzogs //
K12D0701_H0664:4b-25: byang chub yan lag rdzogs pa dang //
K12D0701_H0664:4b-26: chos kyi rang bzhin stong nyid do //
K12D0701_H0664:4b-28: sku bstan pa'i le'u ste dang po'o ////
K12D0701_H0664:4b-29: de nas gsang sngags bstan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das
K12D0701_H0664:4b-30: kyis rnam par snang mdzad gang chen mtsho'i zhing khams
K12D0701_H0664:5a-0: @5a *// thams cad du 'od bkye nas gtsug tu nub par gyur to //
K12D0701_H0664:5a-3: na no ratna tra y'a ya /
K12D0701_H0664:5a-4: na ma a'arya dzny'a na s'a ga ra bee ro tsa n'a ya /
K12D0701_H0664:5a-6: ta th'a ga t'a ya aarha te /
K12D0701_H0664:5a-8: na ma:sarba ta th'a ga te bhya:/
K12D0701_H0664:5a-11: n'a ma a'arya aa ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K12D0701_H0664:5a-14: ma h'a k'a ru ni k'a ya /
K12D0701_H0664:5a-21: pra tsa le pra tsa le /
K12D0701_H0664:5a-22: ku su me ku su me wa re /
K12D0701_H0664:5a-24: tsi ti dzva la ma pa na ya sv'ah'a /
K12D0701_H0664:5a-25: sngags 'di rnams kha ton byed pa'i rigs kyi bu'am /
K12D0701_H0664:5a-26: rigs kyi bu mos lan gcig brjod dam /
K12D0701_H0664:5a-27: dran zhing yid la byas sam; lus la bcangs na /
K12D0701_H0664:5a-29: de dang nye ba'i sdig pa'i las 'byang zhing sems can dmyal ba dang /
K12D0701_H0664:5a-31: dud 'gro'i skye gnas su mi skye zhing /
K12D0701_H0664:5a-32: mi khom pa brgyad du sdug bsngal dang bcas par mi 'gyur ro //
K12D0701_H0664:5a-37: 'jigs pa thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0701_H0664:5a-38: aom raksha raksha zhes pas kyang bsrung bar bya'o //
K12D0701_H0664:5a-39: aom aa k'a ro mu kham sarbba dharm'a nam/
K12D0701_H0664:5b-0: a'a dya nutpanna tvata zhes pas gtor ma'i chus yi dvags @5b la mchod par bya ste /
K12D0701_H0664:5b-2: de rnams srung ba'i sngags so //
K12D0701_H0664:5b-6: rigs gsum gyi bdag por 'gyur te /
K12D0701_H0664:5b-9: chos kyi sku dang gzugs kyi sku'i thugs rje chen po mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0701_H0664:5b-10: aom na ma: sarba ta th'a ga t'a dhu pe
K12D0701_H0664:5b-11: p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na
K12D0701_H0664:5b-12: sa ma ye h'um/ aom na ma:sarba ta th'a ga
K12D0701_H0664:5b-13: t'a pushepa p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha
K12D0701_H0664:5b-14: ra na sa ma ye h'um/
K12D0701_H0664:5b-15: aom na ma:sarba ta th'a ga ta a'a lo ke
K12D0701_H0664:5b-16: p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na
K12D0701_H0664:5b-17: sa ma ye h'um/ aom na ma: sarba ta th'a
K12D0701_H0664:5b-18: ga ta gandhe p'u dza me gha sa mu dra
K12D0701_H0664:5b-19: spha ra na sa ma ye h'um/
K12D0701_H0664:5b-20: aom na ma: sarba ta th'a ga ta nee wi
K12D0701_H0664:5b-21: dya p'u dze me gha sa mu dra spha ra
K12D0701_H0664:5b-23: aom na ma: sarba ta th'a ga ta shapta p'u
K12D0701_H0664:5b-24: dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa
K12D0701_H0664:5b-25: ma ye h'um/ aom na ma: sarba ta th'a ga
K12D0701_H0664:5b-26: ta manda la p'u dza me gha sa mu dra
K12D0701_H0664:5b-27: spha ra na sa ma ye h'um/
K12D0701_H0664:5b-28: de nas mchod pas yang dag mchod //
K12D0701_H0664:5b-29: stong nyid ye shes las byung ba'i //
K12D0701_H0664:5b-30: thabs dang shes rab gnyis ldan pa'i //
K12D0701_H0664:5b-31: hr'i: yig dkar po yang dag ldan //
K12D0701_H0664:5b-32: sngags kyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o ////
K12D0701_H0664:5b-33: las dang cho ga bstan pa'i phyir //
K12D0701_H0664:5b-34: dang po zhi ba'i las bsgrubs na //
K12D0701_H0664:5b-35: yid du 'ong ba'i gnas dag tu //
K12D0701_H0664:5b-36: dkar po dang po gsal dus su //
K12D0701_H0664:6a-2: me tog dkar po bkram byas nas //
K12D0701_H0664:6a-3: khrus dang kha zas phyogs mthun pa'i //
K12D0701_H0664:6a-4: bde ba'i stan la nyer 'dug ste //
K12D0701_H0664:6a-5: bum pa dkar po tsandan dkar //
K12D0701_H0664:6a-6: dris bkang gos kyis legs par dkri //
K12D0701_H0664:6a-7: mandal dbus su legs par gzhag /
K12D0701_H0664:6a-8: hr'i: las byung ba'i sems dpa'i sku //
K12D0701_H0664:6a-9: zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog dkar //
K12D0701_H0664:6a-10: rgyan rnams rdzogs pa padma bsnams //
K12D0701_H0664:6a-11: zla ba'i gdan la legs bzhugs pa //
K12D0701_H0664:6a-13: phyag stong spyan yang de bzhin te //
K12D0701_H0664:6a-14: rgyas pa'i sku ni mdun bsams nas //
K12D0701_H0664:6a-16: bzlas pa rab tu gsal ba ste //
K12D0701_H0664:6a-17: gsang sngags 'di ni brjod par bya'o //
K12D0701_H0664:6a-18: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12D0701_H0664:6a-19: na ma a'arya dzny'a na sa g'a ra bee ro tsa na ya /
K12D0701_H0664:6a-23: na ma: sarba ta th'a ga te bhya:/
K12D0701_H0664:6a-26: na ma a'arya aa ba le ki te shva r'a ya /
K12D0701_H0664:6a-29: ma h'a ka ru ni k'a ya /
K12D0701_H0664:6a-30: aa mi ta bha ya che ge mo sh'antim ku ru sv'ah'a /
K12D0701_H0664:6a-33: brum/ rnam par snang mdzad bum pa'i chus //
K12D0701_H0664:6a-34: gang dag legs par khrus byed pa //
K12D0701_H0664:6a-35: dri ma thams cad yongs dag nas //
K12D0701_H0664:6b-0: @6b 'jigs pa kun las rnam grol nas //
K12D0701_H0664:6b-1: myur du chu skyes mthong bar 'gyur //
K12D0701_H0664:6b-2: de nas rgyas pa sgrub 'dod na //
K12D0701_H0664:6b-3: nags tshal shin tu mtho bar ni //
K12D0701_H0664:6b-4: dri zhim chu yis legs byugs la //
K12D0701_H0664:6b-5: 'bras bur bcas pa'i me tog dgram //
K12D0701_H0664:6b-6: rgyan rnams yongs su btags nas ni //

K12D0701_H0664:6b-8: rin chen sna lnga 'bru snar bcas //
K12D0701_H0664:6b-9: rin chen ga 'ur blug par bya //
K12D0701_H0664:6b-10: mandal dbus su legs par gzhag /

K12D0701_H0664:6b-13: rgyan rnams rdzogs pa padma bsnams //
K12D0701_H0664:6b-14: phyag stong spyan yang de bzhin te //
K12D0701_H0664:6b-15: rgyas pa'i sku ni mdun bsams nas //
K12D0701_H0664:6b-16: mchod pa lnga yis yang dag mchod //

K12D0701_H0664:6b-28: ma h'a k'a ru ni k'a ya /
K12D0701_H0664:6b-29: ratna ku na pushtim ku ru sv'a h'a /
K12D0701_H0664:6b-30: bang mdzod stong pa'i thog bzhag na; ;'bru yis yongs su khengs par 'gyur //
K12D0701_H0664:6b-31: de nas dbang gi las byed na //
K12D0701_H0664:6b-32: sdud par byed na chu klung 'gram //
K12D0701_H0664:6b-33: pa la sha dang aa shvattha //
K12D0701_H0664:7a-0: me tog dmar po'i ril bu @7a *//
K12D0701_H0664:7a-1: byas; ;bse gab dmar po'i nang du gzhug /
K12D0701_H0664:7a-2: me tog dmar pos rab tu mchod //

K12D0701_H0664:7a-21: aa mo gha bhasmi ku ru /

K12D0701_H0664:7a-23: rdzas kyi lde gus lus byugs na //
K12D0701_H0664:7a-24: byugs pa de yis khugs par 'gyur //
K12D0701_H0664:7a-26: dur khrod shing gcig dag tu ni //

K12D0701_H0664:7a-28: me tog sngon po nim pa yi //

K12D0701_H0664:7b-0: drang @7b srong khros pa'i cha byad can //
K12D0701_H0664:7b-1: phyag bzhi dang po mchog sbyin pa //
K12D0701_H0664:7b-2: g-yon pa pad steng ral gri can //

K12D0701_H0664:8a-5: dri zhim dkar pos yongs gtor te //

K12D0701_H0664:8a-15: dmar po bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu //
K12D0701_H0664:8a-16: ri dvags pags pas stod g-yogs shing //
K12D0701_H0664:8a-17: sna tshogs sham thabs mnabs pa yi //
K12D0701_H0664:8a-18: zhabs gnyis phyag drug mnyam par bzhengs //
K12D0701_H0664:8a-19: g-yas g-yon dang po thal mo sbyar //
K12D0701_H0664:8a-20: bar ma bgrang phreng padma bsnams //
K12D0701_H0664:8a-21: tha ma mchog sbyin spyi blugs 'dzin //
K12D0701_H0664:8a-22: bum pa rnam snang lha mo ni; ;l'a sye ma le girti ste //
K12D0701_H0664:8a-23: nirti nang gi lha mo dag /
K12D0701_H0664:8a-24: zla ba'i gdan la legs par bzhugs //
K12D0701_H0664:8a-25: hr'i: yi yi ge las byung ba'i //
K12D0701_H0664:8a-26: gsang sngags rgyal po bzlas par bya //
K12D0701_H0664:8a-27: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12D0701_H0664:8a-28: na ma a'arya dzny'a na s'a ga ra bee ro tsa n'a ya /
K12D0701_H0664:8a-33: na ma: sarba ta th'a ga te bhya:/
K12D0701_H0664:8b-2: na ma a'arya ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K12D0701_H0664:8b-5: ma h'a k'a ru ni k'a ya /
K12D0701_H0664:8b-12: pra tsa le pra tsa le /
K12D0701_H0664:8b-13: ku su me ku su ma wa re /
K12D0701_H0664:8b-14: ai li mi li tsi ti dzva la ma pa na ya sv'a h'a /
K12D0701_H0664:8b-15: bum pa'i chu la legs bsgrubs nas //
K12D0701_H0664:8b-16: lus la byugs na 'grub par 'gyur; cho gas sgrub pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o ////
K12D0701_H0664:8b-17: de nas thabs kyi rim pa ni /
K12D0701_H0664:8b-18: gro ga'am ras sam shing shun la //
K12D0701_H0664:8b-19: ra yi 'o mas bris pa yi; ;tshom bu lnga yi 'khor lo la //
K12D0701_H0664:8b-20: dbus su sku yi sa bon te //
K12D0701_H0664:8b-21: lnga pa yi ni lnga pa ste //
K12D0701_H0664:8b-22: shar du de yang bri bar bya //
K12D0701_H0664:8b-23: bzhi pa'i lnga pas dbus su mtshan //
K12D0701_H0664:8b-24: lho ru de ni yang dag dgod //
K12D0701_H0664:8b-25: lnga pa'i dang po bzhi pa'i gsum //
K12D0701_H0664:8b-26: nub tu de ni yang dag dgod //
K12D0701_H0664:8b-27: lnga pa yi ni lnga pa la //
K12D0701_H0664:8b-28: ae yi rnam par sbyar ba ste //
K12D0701_H0664:8b-29: byang du de ni yang dag dgod //
K12D0701_H0664:8b-30: dbus su thugs kyi sa bon te //
K12D0701_H0664:8b-32: sv'a h'a dbus su dgod par bya //
K12D0701_H0664:8b-33: de ltar 'khor lo gsal bkod nas //
K12D0701_H0664:8b-34: dngul lam dkar po'i ga'ur gzhug /
K12D0701_H0664:8b-35: thams cad las kun zhi bar 'gyur //
K12D0701_H0664:8b-36: yung ba'i chu yis bris pa yi //
K12D0701_H0664:8b-38: kham phor ser por legs par gzhug /
K12D0701_H0664:9a-2: pa la sha yis legs par bris //
K12D0701_H0664:9a-3: ba sham ku ru mtshams su dgod //
K12D0701_H0664:9a-4: kham phor dmar por legs par gzhug /
K12D0701_H0664:9a-6: nim pa'i chu yis legs par bris //
K12D0701_H0664:9a-7: m'a ra ya ni mtshams su dgod //
K12D0701_H0664:9a-8: lcags sam thod par yang dag gzhug /
K12D0701_H0664:9a-10: tsandan dkar po dri zhim zhing //
K12D0701_H0664:9a-11: zhi bas de ni me la bsreg /
K12D0701_H0664:9a-12: 'bras bu mngar dang bcas pa'i shing //
K12D0701_H0664:9a-13: rgyas pas de ni me la bsreg /
K12D0701_H0664:9a-14: dbang ni pa la sha yi shing //
K12D0701_H0664:9a-15: de la bsregs na khugs par 'gyur //
K12D0701_H0664:9a-16: nim pa'i shing la tshar gcad pa'i //
K12D0701_H0664:9a-19: de nas las kyi rim pa ni //
K12D0701_H0664:9a-21: til dang yungs kar ci tse la //
K12D0701_H0664:9a-22: gsang sngags bzlas nas grub pa ni //
K12D0701_H0664:9a-23: da li'i shing la legs bsregs nas //
K12D0701_H0664:9a-24: thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur //
K12D0701_H0664:9a-25: ku sha star bu shug 'brum dang //
K12D0701_H0664:9a-26: stag pa'i me tog dmar po dang //
K12D0701_H0664:9a-27: gsang sngags bzlas pa rab byas nas //
K12D0701_H0664:9a-28: tsandan shing la legs bsregs nas //
K12D0701_H0664:9b-0: rgyas par bya ba'i las 'grub @9b cing //
K12D0701_H0664:9b-1: nus pa mchog ni thob par 'gyur //
K12D0701_H0664:9b-2: pa la sha yi shing dag dang //
K12D0701_H0664:9b-3: khre dang ci tse mo sran la //
K12D0701_H0664:9b-4: gsang sngags bzlas pa rab byas te //
K12D0701_H0664:9b-5: padma ka yi shing la bsregs //
K12D0701_H0664:9b-6: nus pa mchog ni thob par 'gyur //
K12D0701_H0664:9b-8: gro dang so ba 'bras dang ni //
K12D0701_H0664:9b-9: bra bo mon sran til nag po //
K12D0701_H0664:9b-10: gsang sngags rab tu bzlas byas te //
K12D0701_H0664:9b-11: kha ti ra yi shing la bsreg /
K12D0701_H0664:9b-12: nus dang ldan te las rnams ni //
K12D0701_H0664:9b-14: pra ha kha tsha'i shing dag la //
K12D0701_H0664:9b-15: lo ma 'bras bur bcas pa dang //
K12D0701_H0664:9b-16: rdo rje'i shing la sngags bzlas nas //
K12D0701_H0664:9b-17: mya ngan 'tshang gi shing la bsreg /
K12D0701_H0664:9b-18: nus pa thob nas myur du ni //
K12D0701_H0664:9b-19: mi rnams thams cad dbang du sdud; ;ldong ros padma'i rtsa ba la //
K12D0701_H0664:9b-20: mu la pa tra'i shing dag la //
K12D0701_H0664:9b-21: gsang sngags rab tu bzlas byas nas //
K12D0701_H0664:9b-22: aa ru ra yi shing la bsreg /
K12D0701_H0664:9b-24: rgyal po dbang du byed par 'gyur //
K12D0701_H0664:9b-25: pa la sha yi shing dag dang //
K12D0701_H0664:9b-26: k'a ra bi ra'i 'bras dag la //
K12D0701_H0664:9b-27: gsang sngags rab tu bzlas byas nas //
K12D0701_H0664:9b-28: 'dzam bu'i shing la rab bsregs nas //
K12D0701_H0664:9b-29: ral gri 'og tu bcug na ni //
K12D0701_H0664:9b-30: yul dbang yang ni dbang du 'gyur //
K12D0701_H0664:9b-31: tshe rabs brgya ru lon pa'i rus //
K12D0701_H0664:10a-0: mtshon gyis bsnun pa'i rus pa @10a *//
K12D0701_H0664:10a-2: gsang sngags rab tu bzlas byas nas //
K12D0701_H0664:10a-3: skyer pa'i me la rab bsregs te //
K12D0701_H0664:10a-4: lcags kyu'i 'og tu rab bcug na //
K12D0701_H0664:10a-5: glang po dbang du 'gyur bar byed //
K12D0701_H0664:10a-6: ba le ta dang ta le sha //
K12D0701_H0664:10a-7: kha ti ra dang dha ti ma //
K12D0701_H0664:10a-8: dur khrod shing la rab bsregs na //
K12D0701_H0664:10a-9: stag la sogs pa dbang du 'du //
K12D0701_H0664:10a-10: nas dang 'bras dang so ba dang //
K12D0701_H0664:10a-11: sman dang rin chen sna tshogs kyis //
K12D0701_H0664:10a-12: mandal zlum po legs byas te //
K12D0701_H0664:10a-13: rgyan rnams rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni //
K12D0701_H0664:10a-14: padma chu shel las skyes pa'i //
K12D0701_H0664:10a-15: chu shel mdog can 'dzum dang bcas //
K12D0701_H0664:10a-16: rdo rje skyil mo krung bcas bzhugs //
K12D0701_H0664:10a-17: ku sha'i stan la shar du 'dug /
K12D0701_H0664:10a-18: padma'i phyag rgya bcas pa yis //
K12D0701_H0664:10a-19: byams pa'i sems kyis dbul bar bya'o //
K12D0701_H0664:10a-20: nad dang rims dang 'brum bu dang //
K12D0701_H0664:10a-21: shu ba g-yan pa me dpal dang //
K12D0701_H0664:10a-22: nad dang gdon ni thams cad bzlog /
K12D0701_H0664:10a-23: mtshams med lnga dang mi dge ba'i //
K12D0701_H0664:10a-24: 'bras bu sdug bsngal thams cad bzlog /
K12D0701_H0664:10a-25: me'i las kyi le'u ste lnga pa'o ////
K12D0701_H0664:10a-26: de nas rgyal po'i 'jigs pa la //
K12D0701_H0664:10a-27: mandal dkar po legs byas la //
K12D0701_H0664:10a-28: tsandan dkar po'i dris bsgos te //
K12D0701_H0664:10a-29: mchod yon me tog dkar po dang //
K12D0701_H0664:10a-30: ci 'byor pa yis mchod pa yis //
K12D0701_H0664:10b-0: rgyal po lta @10b bu'i gzugs la mchod //
K12D0701_H0664:10b-1: sdig pa thams cad de mdun du //
K12D0701_H0664:10b-2: bshags nas myur du skyabs su 'gro //
K12D0701_H0664:10b-3: gro ga dag gam shing shun la //
K12D0701_H0664:10b-4: rgyal po dag gi gzugs byas te; ;yig 'bru lnga yis btab pa yis //
K12D0701_H0664:10b-5: tshon sna lnga yis rab tu bcing //
K12D0701_H0664:10b-6: byams pa'i sems kyis chu bo la //
K12D0701_H0664:10b-7: bkur na rgyal po'i chad las thar //
K12D0701_H0664:10b-8: aom h'um tr'am hr'i: a'a: sho na ha ri ma ka to /
K12D0701_H0664:10b-9: sa ra sa ra ka ra ka ra sv'a h'a /
K12D0701_H0664:10b-11: mandal dkar po legs byas la //
K12D0701_H0664:10b-12: me tog dkar pos rab tu gtor //
K12D0701_H0664:10b-13: mchod pa lnga yis rgyal po mchod //
K12D0701_H0664:10b-14: sdig bshags myur du skyabs su 'gro //
K12D0701_H0664:10b-15: 'bru sna lnga dang rin chen lnga //
K12D0701_H0664:10b-16: tshon sna lnga yi phur ma lnga //
K12D0701_H0664:10b-17: byas pa lus la btags pa la //
K12D0701_H0664:10b-18: gcan gzan 'jigs pa thams cad las //
K12D0701_H0664:10b-19: myur ba nyid du grol bar 'gyur //
K12D0701_H0664:10b-20: aom a'a: h'um trim hr'i: sho sha na ha ri
K12D0701_H0664:10b-21: ha tirma ka ro sa ra sa ra ka ra
K12D0701_H0664:10b-23: chom rkun dag gis 'jigs pa la //
K12D0701_H0664:10b-24: me tog sngon po rdo rje can //
K12D0701_H0664:10b-25: mthing nags gnon phyag rgya can //
K12D0701_H0664:10b-26: mchod nas bdag nyid skyabs su 'gro //
K12D0701_H0664:10b-27: aom aaksho bhya: ta ka ka ra na ga ra
K12D0701_H0664:10b-28: kha ti ba sva dhi tsikra ta ya ri ka
K12D0701_H0664:10b-29: tse tsa tra tin du danta sa ra sa ra
K12D0701_H0664:10b-30: ka ra ka ra sv'a h'a /
K12D0701_H0664:10b-31: sbrul gyi gdug pas 'jigs pa la //
K12D0701_H0664:10b-32: bal po se 'u'i lcug ma la //
K12D0701_H0664:11a-2: rin chen 'byung ldan skur bsgoms te //
K12D0701_H0664:11a-3: spyi bor mu tig byi ru dang //
K12D0701_H0664:11a-4: man shel padma r'a ga dang //
K12D0701_H0664:11a-5: aindra n'i la dung g-yas 'khyil; ;gser dang dngul dang dur ba dang //
K12D0701_H0664:11a-6: rin chen rgyan dang 'bru snar bcas //
K12D0701_H0664:11a-7: ku sha gla rtsi tsandan dang //
K12D0701_H0664:11a-8: ba lu skyer pa autpa la //
K12D0701_H0664:11a-9: gur gum dri zhim lus la byug /
K12D0701_H0664:11a-10: aom ratna sam bh'a ba sa tam bi sha sa ra sa ra ka ra ka ra sv'ah'a //
K12D0701_H0664:11a-12: stag dang 'brug gi rus pa dang //
K12D0701_H0664:11a-13: 'khar ba'i phye ma lcags phye dang //
K12D0701_H0664:11a-14: zangs phye ra gan phye ma dang //
K12D0701_H0664:11a-15: gser gyi phye ma gro bar btum //
K12D0701_H0664:11a-16: snang ba mtha' yas skur bsgoms te //
K12D0701_H0664:11a-17: byams pas phyogs mtshams kun tu bstan //
K12D0701_H0664:11a-18: dug rnams sna tshogs dud pas bdug /
K12D0701_H0664:11a-19: aom aa mri ta badzra dzva la badzra dzva la /
K12D0701_H0664:11a-21: sa ra sa ra ka ra ka ra sv'ah'a /
K12D0701_H0664:11a-22: mi yis 'jigs pa dag la ni; ;'brug rus sen da wa sha dang //
K12D0701_H0664:11a-23: til dang s'a lu tsi tsi dang //
K12D0701_H0664:11a-24: nas dang gro dang rgun 'brum gyi //
K12D0701_H0664:11a-25: thang phrom dag la sngags btab ste //
K12D0701_H0664:11a-26: mi yi phyogs su gtor bar bya //
K12D0701_H0664:11a-27: aom bee ro tsa na pra bha dzva la dzva
K12D0701_H0664:11a-28: la sa ra sa ra ka ra ka ra sv'ah'a
K12D0701_H0664:11a-29: / rnam par snang mdzad skur bsgoms te //
K12D0701_H0664:11a-30: me la gtor nas sa yis gsod //
K12D0701_H0664:11b-0: @11b chu bo dag gis 'jigs pa la //
K12D0701_H0664:11b-1: mdze can pho mo'i thod pa ni //
K12D0701_H0664:11b-2: ra dang khyi dang phag gi khrag /
K12D0701_H0664:11b-3: sa bdag sde brgyad gzugs dang bcas //
K12D0701_H0664:11b-4: nang du bcug ste chu bor dor; ;don yod grub pa'i sku ru gsal //
K12D0701_H0664:11b-6: aom ka bee t'a ra ni sa ra sa ra ka ra ka ra sv'ah'a /
K12D0701_H0664:11b-7: phyag stong spyan yang de bzhin te //
K12D0701_H0664:11b-8: thugs rje chen po'i sku mchog ni //
K12D0701_H0664:11b-9: so sor gsal zhing bsgom par bya //
K12D0701_H0664:11b-10: so so'i dbu la so sor bsam //
K12D0701_H0664:11b-11: byams pas kun la rab tu blta //
K12D0701_H0664:11b-13: 'jigs pa kun srung ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o ////
K12D0701_H0664:11b-14: sku gdung me tog dkar pos mchod //
K12D0701_H0664:11b-15: sa gzhi dri yis chag chag btab //
K12D0701_H0664:11b-16: snying po gzungs dang bcas pa'am //
K12D0701_H0664:11b-17: khru gang tshad kyi mchod rten la //
K12D0701_H0664:11b-18: legs par mchod cing bstod par bgyi //
K12D0701_H0664:11b-19: stong nyid ye shes las byung ba'i //
K12D0701_H0664:11b-20: thugs rje'i gzugs kyi rten du shar //
K12D0701_H0664:11b-21: rdzu 'phrul tshad med bzhi dang ldan //
K12D0701_H0664:11b-22: byang chub phyogs rnams yongs su rdzogs //
K12D0701_H0664:11b-23: dri med dung 'dra dkar po ste //
K12D0701_H0664:11b-24: rgyal chen bzhi yang de bzhin no //
K12D0701_H0664:11b-25: byang chub chen po'i mchod rten ni //
K12D0701_H0664:11b-26: khri 'phang bcu gsum tog dang ldan //
K12D0701_H0664:11b-27: lha yi rol mo char du 'bab //
K12D0701_H0664:11b-28: chos sgra rgyun mi 'chad pa'i gter //
K12D0701_H0664:12a-1: nyid de; ;phur bus gdab cing yongs su gzung //
K12D0701_H0664:12a-2: sangs rgyas kun gyi byin rlabs che //
K12D0701_H0664:12a-3: de yi bsod nams rab bstan pa //
K12D0701_H0664:12a-4: mtshams med lnga dang mi dge bcu //
K12D0701_H0664:12a-5: nyon mongs dbang gyur sdig pa rnams //
K12D0701_H0664:12a-6: skad cig tsam gyis dag par 'gyur //
K12D0701_H0664:12a-7: shin tu gtsang ba'i gnas dag ni //
K12D0701_H0664:12a-8: byams ldan snying rje can gyis byas //
K12D0701_H0664:12a-9: bram ze'i rigs las byung ba yi //
K12D0701_H0664:12a-10: 'bri mkhan snying rje can gyis bya //
K12D0701_H0664:12a-11: rang bsam rnam par dag pa yis //
K12D0701_H0664:12a-12: mdun du bdar te mchod par bya //
K12D0701_H0664:12a-13: tshad dang kha dog yongs dag gsal //
K12D0701_H0664:12a-15: zas dag yid du 'ong ba yi //
K12D0701_H0664:12a-16: dkar gsum sbags pa spangs ba yis; ;sha dang sgog pa la phug dang //
K12D0701_H0664:12a-17: zan dang chang ni shin tu sprang //
K12D0701_H0664:12a-18: shel phreng padma'i snying po dang //
K12D0701_H0664:12a-19: bo dhi tse dang mu tig shis //
K12D0701_H0664:12a-20: glal dang sbrid pa mi tshigs rnams //
K12D0701_H0664:12a-21: nam yang chod par mi bya'o //
K12D0701_H0664:12a-22: yo byad dang dam tshig bsten pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o ////
K12D0701_H0664:12a-23: las rnams sna tshogs sgrub byed na; ;po ti'am lugs ma ras ris la //
K12D0701_H0664:12a-24: brten nas bdag ni byams sems ldan //
K12D0701_H0664:12b-0: dmar ser autpal pu ti @12b 'dzin; ;mnyam pa skyil mo krung gis bzhugs //
K12D0701_H0664:12b-1: bum pa kha dog ser po ni //
K12D0701_H0664:12b-2: rin chen lnga dang 'bru snar bcas //
K12D0701_H0664:12b-9: pra tsa le pra tsa le /
K12D0701_H0664:12b-10: ku su me ku su me wa re /
K12D0701_H0664:12b-12: tsi ti dzva la ma pa na ya sv'ah'a /
K12D0701_H0664:12b-13: lan bdun yongs su bzlas byas na //
K12D0701_H0664:12b-14: gti mug thams cad zhi bar 'gyur //
K12D0701_H0664:12b-15: shes rab chen po thob par 'gyur //
K12D0701_H0664:12b-16: ras ris mchod rten la brten nas //
K12D0701_H0664:12b-17: mandal dri zhim me tog dgram //
K12D0701_H0664:12b-18: dkar gsum mngar gsum dag dang ni //
K12D0701_H0664:12b-19: 'bras dang til dang yungs kar dang //
K12D0701_H0664:12b-20: padma'i rtsa ba dkar po la //
K12D0701_H0664:12b-21: ril bu rgya shug 'brum bu tsam //
K12D0701_H0664:12b-22: spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug ni //
K12D0701_H0664:12b-23: hr'i: las byung ba'i sku mdog dkar //
K12D0701_H0664:12b-24: phyag na padma mchog sbyin mdzad //
K12D0701_H0664:12b-25: sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs //
K12D0701_H0664:12b-32: pra tsa le pra tsa le /
K12D0701_H0664:12b-33: ku su me ku su me wa re /
K12D0701_H0664:12b-35: tsi ti dzva la ma pa na ya sv'ah'a /
K12D0701_H0664:12b-36: ril bu dag la sngags btab ste //
K12D0701_H0664:12b-37: byams pa'i sems dang ldan pas bza'//
K12D0701_H0664:12b-38: srid pa'i 'dod chags zhi gyur nas //
K12D0701_H0664:12b-39: rab tu bde ba thob par 'gyur //
K12D0701_H0664:12b-40: mandal sngon po legs byas nas //
K12D0701_H0664:13a-2: aa ga ru dang tsandan dang //
K12D0701_H0664:13a-3: dri yi chu yis bum pa dgang //
K12D0701_H0664:13a-4: phyag na rdo rje gos sngon can //
K12D0701_H0664:13a-5: sku mdog ljang sngon cung zhig khro //
K12D0701_H0664:13a-6: rdo rje dril bu phyag na bsnams //
K12D0701_H0664:13a-7: sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs //
K12D0701_H0664:13a-14: pra tsa le pra tsa le /
K12D0701_H0664:13a-15: ku su me ku su me wa re /
K12D0701_H0664:13a-17: tsi ti dzva la ma pa na ya sv'ah'a /
K12D0701_H0664:13a-18: h'um bskyed phyag na rdo rje yis //
K12D0701_H0664:13a-19: bum pa'i chu yis khrus byas na; ;zhe sdang rab tu zhi bar 'gyur //
K12D0701_H0664:13a-20: bzod pa chen po thob par 'gyur //
K12D0701_H0664:13a-21: dug rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o ////
K12D0701_H0664:13a-22: ras sam gro ga shing shun la //
K12D0701_H0664:13a-23: 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi mu khyud bcas //
K12D0701_H0664:13a-27: che ge mo la raksha raksha zhes bya'o //
K12D0701_H0664:13a-28: srung ba lus la btags byas na //
K12D0701_H0664:13a-29: nad dang gdon dang rims dang ni //
K12D0701_H0664:13a-30: 'jigs pa'i nad dang gdon las thar //
K12D0701_H0664:13a-31: bde ba yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur //
K12D0701_H0664:13a-32: skud pa dag ni dkar po la; ;mdud pa dag ni rab byas te //
K12D0701_H0664:13a-33: bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig gam //
K12D0701_H0664:13a-34: brgya rtsa brgyad ni legs bzlas nas //
K12D0701_H0664:13a-35: srung ba'i dam pa 'di byas na //
K12D0701_H0664:13b-0: srung ba yi @13b ni dam pa 'dis //
K12D0701_H0664:13b-2: mu tig rin chen byi ru gser //
K12D0701_H0664:13b-3: ga bur gur gum gla rtsi dang //
K12D0701_H0664:13b-4: aa ga ru dang du ru ska //
K12D0701_H0664:13b-5: phur ma snying gar gdags par bya; ;tsandan gla rtsi gur gum dang //
K12D0701_H0664:13b-6: gu gul nag po bsregs pa'i phye //
K12D0701_H0664:13b-7: ba yi 'o mas lde gu byas //
K12D0701_H0664:13b-8: gnas gsum dag tu byugs pas ni //
K12D0701_H0664:13b-9: gdon dang nad kyis 'jigs kun la //
K12D0701_H0664:13b-10: byugs pas de ni srung bar 'gyur //
K12D0701_H0664:13b-11: srung ba'i 'khor lo'i le'u ste dgu pa'o ////
K12D0701_H0664:13b-12: ser ba yongs su srung ba ni //
K12D0701_H0664:13b-13: seng ldeng lhang ti'i phur bu la //
K12D0701_H0664:13b-14: gzungs sngags bzlas nas dbus su ni //
K12D0701_H0664:13b-15: h'um las byung ba'i sku bskyed do //
K12D0701_H0664:13b-16: phyogs bzhir khro bo chen po ni //
K12D0701_H0664:13b-17: shar du khams gsum rnam rgyal ni //
K12D0701_H0664:13b-18: sku mchog dkar po me dpung 'bar //
K12D0701_H0664:13b-19: rdo rje 'khor lo sdigs mdzub mdzad //
K12D0701_H0664:13b-20: aom pra dzny'anta kri ta ha na ha na h'um phat/
K12D0701_H0664:13b-21: lho ru gshin rje gshed po ni //
K12D0701_H0664:13b-22: dmar nag lag na be con 'dzin //
K12D0701_H0664:13b-23: aom ya m'anta krita tishtha tishtha h'um phat/
K12D0701_H0664:13b-24: nub tu rta mgrin dmar po ni //
K12D0701_H0664:13b-25: me dpung rdo rje dbyug pa 'dzin //
K12D0701_H0664:13b-26: aom ha ya gri ba hu lu hu lu h'um phat/
K12D0701_H0664:13b-27: byang du khro gnyer can sku ni //
K12D0701_H0664:13b-28: ljang sngon ral gri 'dzin pa ste //
K12D0701_H0664:13b-29: aom aa mo gha ka bhri ku ti bandha bandha h'um phat/
K12D0701_H0664:13b-30: phyogs bzhir phur bu dag la ne //
K12D0701_H0664:14a-2: gcan gzan dri ma yungs kar bsres //
K12D0701_H0664:14a-3: gsang sngags bzlas shing mkha' la gtor //
K12D0701_H0664:14a-4: aom badzra kro dha hu lu hu lu /
K12D0701_H0664:14a-7: ha na ha na h'um phat/
K12D0701_H0664:14a-8: ser ba srung ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o ////
K12D0701_H0664:14a-9: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od zar rab tu
K12D0701_H0664:14a-10: bkye ste phyag stong dang spyan stong las 'od zer
K12D0701_H0664:14a-17: 'od zer de dag gis 'gro ba ris drug po
K12D0701_H0664:14a-18: de dag thams cad la khyab ste dbugs dbyung bar
K12D0701_H0664:14a-19: mdzad do // de nas rgyal chen rigs bzhi dang /
K12D0701_H0664:14b-0: 'og min la sogs pa'i lha'i bu de @14b dag
K12D0701_H0664:14b-1: gis mchod pa'i sprin gyi char phab nas lha'i bu
K12D0701_H0664:14b-2: rnams kyis tshigs su bcad pas bstod pa //
K12D0701_H0664:14b-3: spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje'i sku //
K12D0701_H0664:14b-4: phyag stong nyon mongs sgrol ba'i phyag /
K12D0701_H0664:14b-5: spyan stong shes rab 'od gsal te //
K12D0701_H0664:14b-7: ces bstod nas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po'i
K12D0701_H0664:14b-8: sku de mi snang bar gyur nas bcom ldan 'das
K12D0701_H0664:14b-10: de nas lha'i bus gsol pa /
K12D0701_H0664:14b-11: 'di'i phan yon ci yin zhes zhus pa dang /
K12D0701_H0664:14b-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa; gang zhig rgyud 'di yid byed na //
K12D0701_H0664:14b-13: nad dang rims dang gdon dang ni //
K12D0701_H0664:14b-14: rgyal po gcan gzan 'jigs pa dang //
K12D0701_H0664:14b-16: 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang //
K12D0701_H0664:14b-17: mtshams med sdig pa mi dge kun //
K12D0701_H0664:14b-18: rab tu zhi bar byed par 'gyur //
K12D0701_H0664:14b-19: dmyal ba ngan song sdug bsngal dang //
K12D0701_H0664:14b-20: mi khom brgyad las rnam grol te //
K12D0701_H0664:14b-22: dri med nam mkha'i dkyil lta bur //
K12D0701_H0664:14b-24: zhes bka' stsal nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
K12D0701_H0664:14b-25: chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan
K12D0701_H0664:14b-26: las langs te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi
K12D0701_H0664:15a-1: so legs so zhes bya ba gsungs nas stan la 'khod do //
K12D0701_H0664:15a-2: byang chub sems dpa' 'bum phrag lnga stong dang /
K12D0701_H0664:15a-5: lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste /
K12D0701_H0664:15a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
K12D0701_H0664:15a-7: padma cod pan zhes bya ba'i rgyud le'u bcu gcig pa rdzogs so ////
K12D0701_H0664:15a-8: pandi ta dharma shr'i mi tra dang /
